short_summary: Competitive selective tendering for Office Furniture Installation or Reconfiguration Service
description: Competitive selective tendering for the purchase of office furniture. The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide installation or reconfiguration of office furniture for the Department of National Defence. The contract is set to start on November 24, 2023, and end on May 31, 2024.
tags: Construction, Furniture and Corporate Services, Contract Procurement,Canada,Ontario
full_summary:
# Office Furniture Request for Proposal
#### (CPPC ID: WS4263679798)

The Department of National Defence (DND) has published a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of office furniture, specifically computer workstations, furniture and furnishings, office furniture, and office furniture installation or reconfiguration services. Canadian suppliers are invited to submit bids.

Key Dates:

*  Publication Date: October 19, 2023
*  Closing Date for Bid Submission: November 23, 2023, at 02:00 PM EST
*  Expected Contract Start Date: November 24, 2023
*  Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2024

Tender Details
----------------

*  Solicitation Number: WS4263679798
*  Reference Number: WS4263679798- Doc4263702939
*  Amendment Number: 8
*  Amendment Date: November 16, 2023
*  Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

Procurement Method
-----------------

This procurement is being conducted through a competitive selective tendering method, with the selection criterion being the Lowest Price.

Considerations
---------------

This procurement opportunity is open to Canadian suppliers and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Canadian suppliers are invited to submit their offers in accordance with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal document. Potential suppliers must ensure that they meet the eligibility criteria and requirements specified in the RFP.

For more information, please refer to the Request for Proposal document available on the Buyandsell platform.

Contact Information:
• Name: Jessica Canas
•  Email: <jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
•  Ariba Discovery Posting Number: 17771744

We look forward to receiving your bid submission in accordance with the specified deadline.
Thank you for participating in this procurement opportunity.
